summary: A configuration container for the InstructBLIP conditional generation model that aggregates vision, Q‑Former, and text sub‑configurations and manages the number of query tokens used in the transformer.
business_intent: Enables developers to define and customize the components of an InstructBLIP model—vision encoder, Q‑Former, and language model—so they can instantiate a multimodal instruction‑following generation system with tailored settings.
